items.title: LEGO’s 16-bit Super Mario World: Mario & Yoshi set with movable legs/tongue falls to new $104 low (Reg. $130)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the best price to date on the LEGO Super Mario World: Mario & Yoshi set at $104 shipped. Normally, you’d be shelling out $130 for this set directly from LEGO, which famously offers very few discounts; however, at Amazon, it’s been seeing some cascading savings since the end of August, dropping to $119, then $117, and now lower-than-ever to $104. This is a 20% markdown that cuts $26 off the tag price, giving you the all-time lowest price we have tracked since it hit the market back in October.

more…

items.title: Overhaul your wardrobe while Amazon Essentials chino pants are priced from $14 (Save 42%)
items.summary:
Amazon Essentials Skinny Chino Pants

Buy from $14 (Reg. $24)

What we love

If your wardrobe could use a bit of a refresh, now is a solid time to cash in. Amazon’s in-house Essentials brand is offering this lineup of pants for as low as $14 a pair. Pricing varies between sizes and styles, but we’re not seeing any that spill over the $20 mark, so stock up while you can.

items.title: Save up to 55% on Segway’s Cube series power stations and solar panels starting from $170
items.summary:
Segway is offering some major savings on its Cube 1000 Portable Power Station down at $449.99 shipped, which is unavailable at Amazon, while the Cube 2000 Portable Power Station has dropped to $849.99 shipped, and is matching in price at Amazon right now. These two backup solutions usually go for $1,000 and $1,700 at full price, which we’ve mostly seen taken down to $500 and $900 with 2025 discounts. While these are not the lowest prices we’ve seen, they are the next-best rates that save you $550 and $850 off their MSRPs. Head below for more on these stations and the parallel solar panel discounts.

items.title: Protect your Tesla’s chassis with Spigen’s magnetic jack pads for $39 (Reg. $50)
items.summary:
Spigen Tesla Magnetic Jack Pads

Buy for $39 (Reg. $50)

What we love

When I spend big on anything, I like to do everything I can to take good care of it. A Tesla certainly fits the bill, and Spigen is here to help you keep it protected from scuffs or damage when it needs jacked up. This bundle includes four magnetic pads that fit nicely in a case that you can easily stow until you need them.

items.title: Free up a congested outlet with this lengthy 15-foot 9-in-1 USB-C surge protector at $14 (Reg. $20)
items.summary:
Addtam 15-foot 9-in-1 USB-C Surge Protector

Buy for $14 (Reg. $20)

What we love

If you have an outlet in your home that is super congested, relocating some outlets elsewhere can make all the difference. This discounted offering is ready and waiting with an extensive 15-foot power cord that allows you to easily get power from one part of a room to another. Once in place, you’ll have six AC outlets, dual USB-C, and one USB-A port at your disposal.

items.title: Bring color and music syncing to your outdoor areas with Linkind’s smart solar spotlights starting from $23 (Reg. $35+)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Linkind is offering its SL5C Smart Solar Spotlights two-pack for $22.98 shipped, with its larger four, eight, and 14-pack bundles also getting discounts on the same page. Carrying a regular price tag at $35 and usually falling to $24.50, it is now back down at one of the lowest prices we have tracked to date, landing just $2 above the low we last saw in April.

items.title: Tight living quarters? You may still be able to fit this countertop dishwasher in there, now $242.50 (Reg. $270)
items.summary:
EUHOMY 5L Countertop Dishwasher

Buy for $242.50 (Reg. $270)

What we love

I’ve said it before, but I live in a home with a small kitchen that has no hope for a full-size dishwasher in it. This lead me to buying a countertop unit like this one, and honestly, it’s one of my favorite purchases several years later. Simply place it next to the sink, load your dishes, add detergent, and fill up the water reservoir, and boom, you’re done.

items.title: ALLPOWERS’ new two-pound airline-approved SOLAX P100 99Wh power station gets first savings to $69 (Reg. $199)
items.summary:
ALLPOWERS is offering the first chance at savings on its latest SOLAX P100 Portable Mini Power Station for $69 shipped. This all-new compact charging solution just hit the market last month and normally carries a $199 price tag outside of discounts. As I mentioned, this is the first time we’re seeing discounts offered on this device, which is also matching in price over at Amazon, after clipping the on-page coupon. All-in-all, you’re looking at a massive 65% markdown that cuts $130 off the tag price and sets the bar for future discounts down the road.

Headlined by an aluminum construction, this metal stand is ready to prop up all modern iPads and most Android tablets. Yes, this includes most devices with an up to 13-inch screen. Two more perks worth noting include its rotatable base alongside two points of articulation.

So if you’re in the habit of enjoying these, it’s probably best you cash in and save big over the years to come by doing it yourself from the comfort of home. This 48-ounce blender is ready to make quick work concocting everything from shakes to smoothies, and I personally think it looks better than most.

Apply code 9WI2Y6DP during checkout

What we love

The popularity of MagSafe has really paved the way for all sorts of creative mounts to exist. This is certainly one of them, with a gooseneck design that can be twisted and turned all sorts of ways to dial in the perfect viewing angle. items.title: Here’s how to get a deal on Hollow Knight Silksong before it releases tomorrow morning
items.summary:
We’re only a few hours away from the launch of Hollow Knight: Silksong, which is arriving tomorrow at a surprisingly low $19.99 in the U.S. Just in time for release day, Newegg is running a deal on a $100 Xbox gift card, dropping it to $88 via email delivery. Simply enter promo code SSEWA63 at checkout to secure the discount. Newegg dishes out these discounted gift cards quite frequently, but this one lines up perfectly for picking up Silksong or even stacking up on Game Pass Ultimate ahead of the big launch. The game, in case you’re wondering, is coming to the Xbox Game Pass tomorrow.
